name: hurl outward at a certain pace
body:
hurl outward at a certain pace is a site-specific work created in ONCA Gallery & online in September 2016. It was commissioned by [Brighton Digital Festival](http://brightondigitalfestival.co.uk/event/hurl-outward-certain-pace-dhra-commission/) & [DRHA 2016](http://www.drha2016.com/). 

3 – 11 September at ONCA Gallery
3 – 30 September online at hurloutward.com


[jane frances dunlop](http://janefrancesdunlop.com/).......[artist statement & list of works](http://files.cargocollective.com/611128/HURL-OUTWARD-AT-A-CERTAIN-PACE.pdf).......exhibition essay
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
